author: markt
msg: The default values for readOnly, autoCommit and transactionIsolation are now taken from the JDBC driver. No calls to setReadOnly(), setAutoCommit() or setTransactionIsolation() will be made for a newly borrowed connection unless a default is explicitly configured (and the connection is currently using a different setting).

author: wikier
msg: MARMOTTA-423: added some documentation to the web site
